text.tspan: Gini Index around 2015 vs. Gini Index around 1990
Estimates are based on household survey data of either incomes or consumption. Countries are only shown where
comparable surveys falling within five years of each reference year were available.
Source: Povcal (2018), The Chartbook of Economic Inequality (2017), Kandbur et al. (2017) Table 1.B
